title: Riders Kicked out of Tour of Guangxi for Racist Gesture Apologize, Call It ‘Life Lesson’
content:
Madis Mihkels and Gerben Thijssen were dropped from the Tour of Guangxi after a video featuring a racist gesture was posted to Instagram.

Read the full article at Riders Kicked out of Tour of Guangxi for Racist Gesture Apologize, Call It ‘Life Lesson’ on Velo.
